conbody.p: The plugin is intended to cover most formatting requirements, but in some cases it may be necessary to create a custom plugin which overrides or adds to some of the features supported by the standard plugin. If so, do not modify the files in the default installation folder (DITA-OT3.x\plugins\), because these files will be overwritten when you install a new version of the Create a custom instead.
